title: Saenai Boku ga Kimi no Heya de Shiteiru Koto wo Kurasumeito ha Dare mo Shiranai - Novel Updates

description:
Touyama, a stupid high school student, who is currently Fucking with his friend Takai Yumi but when he wants to start fucking, it turns out that Touyama has run out of condoms, so Touyama goes out of the house to buy more condoms.

After a while, Touyama finally found a vending machine that contained condoms.

When Touyama was about to take it, he was spotted by his classmate Marika Uehara, a beautiful girl from the elite / top caste group in her class.

Maybe from now on, things would get a little uncomfortable when it was Uehara who would get involved with him.

And Uehara, who had never spoken to Touyama even though they were in the same class, became interested in Touyama.>
